pages.text: $(li)The Notice Board allows you to insert a Book and Quill in it.$(br)$(li)After that, this block will display the contents of the first page of the book.

$(li)You can insert a Map into the Notice Board. This one will show it like an Item Frame.$(br)$(li)You can insert a Pattern into the Notice Board. This one will show the design of the Pattern inserted.$(br)$(li)You can interact with it using Hoppers, so you can make interesting contraptions that display a specific text or map dynamically.
